SELECT BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REGISTER_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REGISTER_DATE FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REGISTER_DATE FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC )
